attributes.action: Regulate bankers bonuses so the waste of money goes to people who need it more
attributes.additional_details: Bankers created a vaste economic black hole which caused and still is causing the misery for hundreds of thousands of people.  Yet bankers geet rewarded every year whilst we get nothing for their greediness.  This needs to be regulated the million pounds bonuses are totally unacceptable and the government need to sort this out immediately even if they are all friends!!!!
